The bearing is just about impossible to get in/out of the ring, especially when trying to put them on your ear. Divots in both my pointer fingers and my thumbs, and 10 minutes of struggling later, and I still haven't been able to get these on. I've worn captive bearing rings before, and never had this much difficulty getting them in. Definitely do not recommend.

UPDATE:
By using some tools, I was able to "stretch" these out a bit, making it easier to slip the bearing on and off. I had a pair like this before that was very easy to take on and off by yourself, and had larger divots in the bearing to make this an easy task. Wish I hadn't lost them, because these certainly don't stand up to that task. Still, for cheap captive bearing earrings, you could do worse. I still recommend shopping around if you plan on taking these off and on frequently.
summary: Extremely difficult (read: impossible) to put on

This is a gorgeous top and good value for the money! I think this top has a product design flaw, assuming that people do not have boobs and they do not sag. It will fit a skinny teenager with size A boobs and does not need to wear bras. I had to redesign mine with some minor and simple adjustments.

1) Un-sew a tinny area on the side (1 inch), enough to remove the padding.
2) Cut off the threats that hold the paddings and remove them through that little opening that you just did.
3) Sew a loop on the two skinny strings that are designing for tying the top around the neck.

Now you have a one size fit all top that you can wear over sport bras, sport tops with boob support, or a skinny T-shirt. The paddings from the top really interfere and do not provide and support. By sewing the loops, you can wear both ways (tying around your neck or use the loops to hold like a bra. Now, the straps become adjustable for larger or smaller boobs.

Now, you have a very pretty top to wear! See my picture!

Having only had it for 8 months, I attempted to contact this Seller (Watch Winder Boxes) and they deferred me to the manufacturer's site.  Must be nice to be able to collect customer's money and then not have to lift a finger when something goes wrong.  Maybe WWB should rethink selling this questionable product.

I feel like Belocia has been misleading shoppers by listing "Japanese Mabuchi Motor" in the description.  Sure, the motor is probably Japanese.  But the entire unit is most likely manufactured and assembled in China, meaning it's construction and quality are suspect, as usual.

So proceed with caution.  If you do not have the disposable income for a $200 display case, this one is a risky choice.

reviewText: So far so good. Quiet, does what it's designed to do.

This watch winder is preposterous. The turns per day recommended on automatic movements is somewhere between 650-1800 depending on movement. However, on modern movements the max TPD recommended is either 650 both directions or 800 clock wise. I am yet to see a modern movement which has requirement of more TPD's than this.

The 4 programs settings mentioned in the product description correspond to extremely high TPD's which essentially can and will damage the movement. Here is the chart after my research and confirmation from another vendor based on similar settings :-

Program 1: 1440 TPD
Program 2: 1440 TPD
Program 3: 5760 TPD
Program 4: 2152 TPD

I don't know if previous buyers realize the significance of TPD's and their impact on the watch movement. But if you own expensive automatic watches, you wanna stay away from this piece.

Not a recommended product at all.
summary: Extremely harmful winder for your automatic watch - Stay away!

reviewText: Wasn't but 8 months after buying this product it stopped working. I submitted a warranty request. I'll edit my review based on their response.

Very nice winder! It's quite attractive, being finished in a pebbly black leather with off-white stitching ( I don't think it's real leather but it looks great). There are only two programming controls for the three winders, so the leftmost and middle winders will wind in unison, and the right-hand winder can be separately programmed. It is very nice and quiet, accommodates large watches (there's good clearance between the pillows and the cover, as well as between the three pillows). BUT: my largest watch is "only" 44mm diameter by 16mm thick. It clears with room to spare, but compared to some of what's for sale these days, that is not really very big.  So don't blame me if your 80mm by 30mm fashion watch doesn't clear the other watches or the glass! :-) I really do not know what the max capacity of this thing is.

This winder looks good next to my other winders (a Wolf and another inexpensive Belocia, different from this one, but also very nice). It provides a nice clear view of the watches inside, and I can't hear it winding at night (it's about 10 feet from the bed). With three winders, quiet, and a nice appearance, for under $150, you can't go wrong. Five stars!
summary: Excellent value in a triple winder

Unfortunately the power supply that came with it was defective.  I used an identical power supply from another brand watch winder and it functioned perfectly.  With Amazon's easy return I just decided to send it back instead of trying to find a power supply and ordered a different one with smaller cushions.

The four stars is based on assuming you get a working power supply/cord.  I took one star off for the winder is slightly louder than my other (Heiden quad) and the cushions are just too big for men with small wrist or just about any ladies watches.
summary: Nice fit and finish of a quality winder

reviewText: After reading nearly two hundred reviews on this jacket I decided on size X-Large in the very cool Khaki color.  I am 5'4 130 Lbs. 38 Large D cup. I have skinny arms.  I own many of these junior sized jackets and like them to be fitted. I also hope to be able to zip them. I usually purchase them in a large, sometimes a medium depending on the information in the reviews  but I'm aware that most of these jackets are junior sized. This jacket is stunning! The X-Large fit me well. The sleeves are plenty long and made for slim arms.  I think the pointed shoulders look very cool.  I am able to  zip it up but it's a tight fit... If you want to fit a sweater underneath, size up two even three sizes from your normal size.  I'm very happy with this jacket. You couldn't ask for more in a faux leather moto jacket at this price. It's as good looking as the photo....*********I decided to order the beige color In an XXLarge.  It was gigantic all over... I'll either use it with a bulky sweater underneath or give it away as a  Christmas gift...

reviewText: First off, the faux leather is very soft! It is also does not have the tell-tale shiny faux leather look of many inexpensive "leather" jackets. Really liked the color as well. There are no pockets, but other than that, I like the style. Do order a size up- I am 5'7 and 110 lbs. I normally wear a size 4 (small) but I ordered this in a medium, and it fit perfect. Though with that said, I can only wear a thin blouse/tshirt under it. If you are wanting to wear a sweater, you will need to order up at least 2 sizes. When you receive the jacket, it will have some wrinkles from packing, and the collar/lapels may not lay flat. I simply put it in the dryer for 5 minutes (on medium), then promptly laid it flat, arranging the collar/lapels how I wanted them to lay. When I hung it in the closet (after it had cooled) I repositioned the collar/lapels, and pushed other clothes (already on hangers) close to it to maintain the shape. Once cooled and hung for a day, the jacket easily maintained it's shape. At this price, I also purchased an identical jacket in the color black. Quite stylish for an inexpensive jacket!

reviewText: The jacket was well-made and very pretty, but it was short-waisted based on the photo.  I expected it to hit closer to my hips and it was more around the top of my waistline.  But it was stylish and very attractive when I put it on.  I'm rating it 4 stars because it was a quality product that looked good even it does run small, and the refund process was seamless.  My money was back on my card within 2 days of submitting a refund request.  If you want this jacket pay attention to the reviews that state it runs small.  It does!  Order at least 1 size larger than you usually wear.

Ok-so I'm 5'1 and I weigh 100 lbs.  I usually wear an XS--sometimes a small.  I ordered this in a medium and it fits great!!  The places where this jacket is unusually small seems to be the DIAMETER of the arms, and in the bust area.  Again--I'm a pretty small person, and the arms of the medium jacket fit just perfect around my arms.  I measured the diameter of the biggest part of my upper arm, and it's 10 inches.  I don't know if that's big-but I don't think my arms are unusually big around.  If I had gotten a smaller size--the arms would have been super tight.  Also, the bust runs very small.  In the medium, I can zip it and it fits perfectly (a tiny bit snug--but I'll be able to zip it and wear a top under it for sure--but nothing bulky).  My bust measures exactly 34".  The length of the arms are 2" too long-but I can roll them up or scrunch.  Shoulder to shoulder, I could have gone a tiny bit smaller-but I have plenty of room there--and you can't tell at all.  The length of the bodice is perfect for my very petite size (again 5'1, and my hip measures 33").  Hope this helps everyone!  This jacket looks like real leather, has an nice feminine cut, and looks awesome!!  I love it!  Just order a couple sizes larger.  :)

one thing though, in the picture the jacket is noticeably narrow at the waist, then wider towards the hip. when i put it on, not so much, but i didn't mind because it still look great.

I'm a US med. so I ordered a large, the fit is still somewhat tight, especially around the upper arms. Also it's super tight on the chest. I'm a C-cup and can hardly zip it up all the way. But it's super cute! And it looks good with just about anything. Although, I would recommend getting two sizes up from what you wear, just to assure a comfortable fit.

Please take all of the reviews regarding size seriously. My girlfriend normally wears a medium, I ordered an XL to be safe... and it was still small on her.

 Also the material is thin... it almost feels like a rain coat. For the price, I expected more (I've purchased nicer jackets from retail stores for less). If you have the money, feel free to buy it... otherwise I say look elsewhere.
summary: You can do better than this....

reviewText: This a nice large bag, perfect for a day at the pool or beach. The fabric quality is good and it is definitely water resistant. When I say it is large, my six year old daughter could fit in it... It's definitely very big. The issue we ran into was with the zipper function and the stitching quality at the seams by the zipper. On about day 3 of our vacation to Hawaii, the tab at the end of the zipper run popped off while we were closing the bag. The next day, the entire stitching fell apart where the tab was and shortly after that the zipper pull fell off and was lost; rendering the bag basically useless since you could not close your belongings within in it any longer. The bag is really nice and I would have given it 5 stars had the zipper function held up. Unfortunately, I will be returning this bag and I'm skeptical to replace it with one just like it.
summary: Great bag but zipper broke after 3 days of use!

reviewText: These are solid shorts for the money.  The color is vivid and the workmanship seems to be good.  The fabric is just okay for me though - not as smooth as other quality brands, but given the price, that is to be expected?  The things that were off for me were: a) I felt a bit misled by some of the reviews saying to size up.  I'm normally an XS in bottoms (a size 4 in Lululemon) and bought a S in these.  XS would have been better so for me these would have been true to size.  I can't blame this on the product; and b) the product detail indicated the inseam was 2".  I'm not sure where they measure this from, but when I measure from the middle of the crotch, they are actually 3 1/4".  Lululemon boogie shorts are 2" inseams and these are much longer than those.  They are also longer looking on me than they seem to be in the picture.  Anyway, they are ok, but not a replacement for me.
summary: Decent shorts but won't be my new go-to

Maybe if you do low impact yoga and don't sweat they'll be fine. I really like that they aren't too high in the waste but they're useless for what i purchased them for. I wear them for Crossfit and have not been disappointed by performance or quality.

I have received multiple complements on this ring. The blue Austrian crystal is a deep blue and just stunning. The clear crystals (sorry, in video I said CZS) around the blue crystal and on the band adds so much beauty to an already pretty ring. Its very stylish; however, it is also classy. This ring has a 1-year warranty so should anything happen, you can send it back, no questions asked. What I did not like: As seen in the video, the blue crystal sits weird. Its not really all the way in the setting. So, if you're looking at it from an angle, you can see that. If you're looking at the ring from atop, you cannot. But, this really is not taking away from the beauty of the ring. And, for the price, you just cant beat it. To sum up my review; I am giving this 4 stars. I would highly recommend it. It does come gift boxed if youd like to give it as a gift.

reviewText: I cannot begin to say how much I love this sweater. I fell in love the first time I wrapped the wool around me. This Merino wool is HEAVY, and I mean that in a good way. Heating a home isn't cheap, that being said, as many dads do, I keep the thermostat set low for energy conservation and to be easy on the budget during the frigid months. In turn, our 114 yr old, poorly insulated Cape Cod in central Ohio gets pretty nippy in the winter months. Let me tell you, this hand crafted Irish classic keeps me toasty. Sliding this hefty sweater around my shoulders reminds me of a big hug from my, loved and missed, great grandmother. The smell of the wool reminds me of her old sweaters too. Overall, I can't stop gushing about this piece of clothing. This has definitely become my favorite winter garment. My wife loves it so much she has picked out a ladies style that she wants for Christmas. Oh, hope this helps too, I'm 5'9 265 lbs and the XL fits me wonderfully. Don't get me wrong, it's a bit snug around my mid-section, but the knit does allow for flexibility with movement. Sweater looks and feels great regardless.
summary: Like a big warm hug from your grandma

reviewText:
For the price, this is a really great mask. The only significant mark against it is the strap, which was just a little too short to easily tie behind my head. I'm a guy and I have a decently large head, but it I easily fit all medium-sized hats. Anybody with a large head might want to plan to use a pin or clip instead of trying to tie the straps. Small-to-medium heads will be able to get it tied, but might need some help.

The mask itself is lightweight and fit my face pretty well, so it didn't get uncomfortable for a few hours. For most of the night, I forgot I was even wearing it; but after a few hours hanging out and dancing in a warm nightclub, I was looking forward to taking it off. All things considered, I think that's the best experience you can ask for on any mask, so I'm not complaining.

The material is sturdy and definitely didn't strike me as particularly fragile, but it allows for a little bit of flex. I don't think I would try to bend it because it would probably snap with enough pressure. However, I bet it could be reshaped with heat and maybe some steam. I'm not sure if that would cause problems for the glue, though.

Aside from the strap, the only other problem with this mask is how many other people I saw wearing something very similar. It's a very common style and in a dark setting the things that make it look different aren't going to show up at all. If you're looking to stand out, this might not be the best choice, or you might consider further styling the mask after you've got it.

Oh, and shipping was super fast. This mask appeared about a week before I expected it with the free shipping option.
summary: Really great mask, especially for the price.

This kilt fit just a little bit large after I followed the measuring instructions to the letter, but I'm willing to accept the possibility of operator error. While looking for a kilt, I saw many, many, 5 yard kilts and lightweight kilts with and without the 24" drop length, but those were as expensive, if not more so than this kilt. For the same yardage, weight, and length on many other sites, it was all but assured that you will be paying quite a bit more. This material is thick, heavy and seems durable (I have only worn it once so far) though I will most likely be replacing the leather belt material as it is thin and I will need to resize it anyway. I wore this on Halloween and I had absolutely no problems staying warm, which I am looking forward to when I wear it again later in November. The colors are nice and sharp, the material, though not wool or particularly authentic, is very comfortable. Overall I think this fits the bill for almost everyone, excepting serious Rennies that are willing to spend the $1,000 plus for true kilts, or even the several hundred. I am very glad I purchased this and am looking forward to showing it off to my friend that has one nearly the same but of much lower quality. If you are thinking about it, buy it. On time and sharpish, in a nice neat package as well.
summary: Can't beat the deal at this price!

So I'm 6'-2", 210lb, and normally wear a 36 waist pant.
I measured like the instructions said, circumference at the navel. I should have been a 40. I ordered the 40 and it fell to the floor when I put it on!
So I ordered the 38, I can tighten it all the way to the last hole on the adjustment tabs and it is just a little too big. Keep in mind, with the amount of adjustment available the 38 could easily fit someone with a 40 in waist.
Of course they're out of stock on the 36 in the Tartan I want so I will return the 40 and have the 38 altered to fit me better.
I don't know if I'm just shaped weird or what but, for me the correct size would have been me normal pant size.
Believe it or not I am happy I went with this kilt over some of the others. Shipping was fast, 2 days.
It may be a little more expensive than some of the other kilts but I feel it was worth it.

So if you have a bigger head, this might fit you a little small. I would expect anything shipping from China to run a bit small.

Speaking of shipping, this didn't take as long to get here as I thought it would. Out of excitement of the price, I placed the order without realizing it was coming from China and was prepared to wait AT LEAST 2 weeks. I ordered it on the 17th and it got here on the 26th.

I'm considering ironing/steaming the hat to see if the warp bubbles will go away (otherwise, they're there to stay). The fabric is made of nice, strong material. A lot more sturdy then I expected. Doesn't really feel like the type of material to get many lint balls, so that's good. The band around the head is removable, so that's a nice option to have. If not, you can just glue/pin it down. The brim is pretty long, so it does a nice job at shading and because it is a simple/minimalist hat, buying it won't be a tragic aesthetic choice (unless you're nitpicky about the wrinkles).

Definitely fits around my head (and then some). In all honesty, it fits a little TOO loosely for my comfort because I'm always worried a random gust of wind will knock it off my head. I live in a city that feels like a wind tunnel, so I do not want to run after my hat as they do in the movies--it's not as adorable as it looks, people.

Recommended if you: like wearing wigs, want to put your hair up in a bun, or just have fabulously thick locks.  It's always risky to buy these things online since you can't try them on, but for the price that I paid ($11), I can't say it was a terrible choice.

My wife bought me a black ceramic ring as a wedding band at a local retailer for $70 a few years back.  I lost weight and the ring became so loose that I had to take it off when showering, washing dishes, even just washing my hands.  Finally I lost it, much to the chagrin of my wife.  After looking for it for a few weeks, I tried getting a new one from the local store.  They no longer carried the ring.

So I did what I always do in situations like this. I looked on Amazon.  I was happy to see a similar ring at less than half the price.  I had to measure my finger using the strip of paper / ruler method. I ordered the wrong size, (probably the same size as the old, much too large ring).  I sent it back free of charge, and got a prompt refund, no questions asked. They started processing the refund as soon I dropped the package off at UPS.

Then I received my new ring, one full size smaller, and it fits perfectly. Great quality, terrific service, awesome price! I'll be surprised if these rings don't surge in popularity.  (Then I bought another, just in case!)  Now I have two rings for $30 less than the cost of the original.

Highly recommended.
summary: Great ring, great service, great price!

It is not deep black like it appears on Amazon, it has a very dark gun metal color that I very much prefer over gloss black. It is also exactly half the weight of my old ring (6 grams vs. 12 grams), which helps me get to work faster commuting on my bicycle. 5 stars!

reviewText: Nicely made, smooth finish without blemishes.  Sized correctly and delivered quickly.

The ring has an excellent finish, no imperfections in shape and shows no signs of wear after rock climbing and working with metal tools.  The inside of the band is laser etched only with the word 'Ceramic'.  Although plastic ring sizers indicated that my finger was a size '9', I found that a size '8' was a perfect fit.  I was easily able to return the first ring I purchased which was too big.  Using high precision calipers, I measured the size '8' to be 18.2mm in inside diameter and the size '9' to be 19.1mm in inside diameter.

Very nice ring, fast delivery, fits perfect, light weight, my only issue (which caused me to give 4 stars instead of 5) is that I would've liked for it to be a dark deep black but instead it is more of a very dark grey. This is most noticeable when compared next to something that is actually black. Otherwise, I love it and look forward to many years wearing it. I would recommend it. Very high shine jewelry grade ceramic. Excellent product over all. Will probably even by the same one as a backup.

reviewText: great
Fit was as expected. Disappointed with quality.

Seem like decent quality so far but wow, weird fit! I've never had panties fit this oddly. The butt is huge but they're tight around the hips. I wish I could choose both too small and too large. I don't have a pancake rear and I'm not extra wide with saddle bags. I suspect these would be an excellent fit on a male athlete who has a serious booty. Slim hips but with a lot of junk in the trunk. Think professional tight end (no pun intended) or perhaps a male figure skater or gymnast, maybe even tennis. From the world of baseball, a decent pitcher who has the resulting glutes from working out to build power, a dude like that could fill the butt on these. Otherwise, the hips feel constricted but the seat feels kinda baggy. The Xtemp bikinis I bought last year were much better. I'll probably go back to those. My suggestion is to do a search for the best butts in men's pro sports to get an idea of who might feel most comfy in these panties.
summary: Fit best suited for someone with a huge butt and slim hips, like an athletic dude

A nice long slip for long formals.

I am a tall person with most of my height in my legs and usually have issues with dresses and skirts being long enough for me.  This is especially true for any maxi style I try.  I have recently come into a popular MMR clothing brand that has fun dresses and their maxi dresses and skirts are actually long enough for me!  The issue I have with them though is that many of them need just a touch more of protection before entering public.  All of the slips I currently own are too short for this as you can tell they cut off too early for the maxi styles.  I had the opportunity to try this slip at a discount if I would give my honest review.  I was skeptical at first, but I figured for a discounted price there was less to lose.  I am so glad that I got this opportunity, but this slip is really long and works perfectly!  I was afraid it would be too sheer when I first got the package, but after opening it it was surprisingly concealing considering that it is white and light weight.  I have included a picture of the slip in the package and one of it being held up against the light to show how much it blocks.  I have a petticoat by the same company that you could see the light through both layers together, so I was very pleased when this held its own.  This are my honest and unbiased opinions on this product.
summary: I have recently come into a popular MMR clothing brand that has fun dresses and their maxi dresses and skirts are actually ...

Perfect fit for long dresses and those of us with long legs.  I wear many maxi dresses and the fit and length is perfect.  Side slits provide ease of movement and also work with skirts that may have a front or side slit--you can position the gaps to line up between the slip and the dress/skirt.

The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is the material is more stiff than silky soft.  I don't mind though, as it keeps some of the lighter weight materials from being to clingy.

Pretty black black and white chucks. Why would I wear anything else?  I have five pair of converse. Three high tops two low tops. Since I bought my very first pair of converse, black high tops the price of them have gone up by about ten dollars. Talk about inflation! The cost and amount of materials used here are minimal.  As they predicted I continued to buy Chucks regardless of price. For a versatile, good looking classic shoe it's worth it to me.

In years of trial and error with converse I have their sizing down to a science. Low tops feel better a half size down from my normal shoe size. I've tried them in my size and a full size smaller and both did not work for me. The half size down was perfect. High tops however I take my normal size in. Don't ask why that's just how they work for me. The half size down in high tops felt too restricted and uncomfortable.

Besides that, the shoe is wonderfully made and last me years. I do rotate shoes so I normally don't wear the same everyday for an extended period of time but they still hold up great. Though I have to say they kind of suck in snow and heavy rain.

I love the look of this ring and the sentiment inscribed on the inside, "Always my Daughter."  The infinity symbols and the wording is absolutely perfect in showing the bond I have with my daughter. The smallest size they had was still too big for my daughter to wear, so I decided to turn the ring into a necklace by putting the ring as a charm on a sterling silver chain.  My daughter loves wearing her special necklace! She tells me she is excited to get older so she can wear it just as a ring.
The ring feels like it is of good quality.  It doesn't feel too light like it will break easily.  The ring came nice and shiny and everything was perfectly smooth.  The design of the ring looked almost exactly like the product pictures shown. The only thing that is slightly different than the product photos is that the wording on the inside of the ring I received is not centered.  It doesn't bother me too much, but I still wish it would have been more like the product photos.

Disclaimer: I received this product at a free or discounted rate in return for my honest and unbiased review. The words written are my own and not influenced in any way by how much I paid. If my experience with the item changes during the course of use, I will make sure to update my review.
summary: Shiny ring but wording not centered

reviewText: I bought this for my daughter who will be turning 12 soon.  Her taste in jewelry and everything else is always changing, so this simple, yet beautiful design is perfect for her.  This came on the exact day it was suppose to in a really big padded envelope, a little excessive, but it kept the ring safe.  While not as a brilliant silver as what is pictured it is still a nice color and metal, one that I think should not turn fingers green or anything like that.  This does not seem to bend and seems to be very durable and strong, it should not break in any way.  The size of the infinity knot is not too big, there is a slight weight to this ring, but nothing that would be uncomfortable.  I gave this four stars for two reasons.  One, I did not get the jewelry pouch that was suppose to come with this.  While not a really big deal, it makes me wonder how accurate the description is of this ring if they can forget a simple thing like the pouch.  Also, the engraving is not really centered on the back of the ring as it appears in the picture advertised.  Again, not a huge deal, but not like it is advertised in the photo. This is beautifully simple, but for the normal price you pay, I expected to get exactly what I saw and was told by the advertisement that I would get.  A good product, just not quite as shown in the picture.

This is such a beautiful ring and my daughter is completely loving this double infinity daughter ring by TZARO.  I have always loved the infinity symbol since I was a kid.  This ring symbolizes so much for my daughter and myself.

In the ring it is engraved "Always My Daughter" which is something that is special from me to her.  The ring is stainless steel and tarnish free, which is nice.

The ring is very beautiful in person and very durable and well made.  The size is true to sizing and fits my daughter perfectly.  It isn't a high end looking piece, but still pretty.

This would make a great gift for you daughter to have.  I do recommend it.

**I did receive this at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.  Compensation of any kind is never accepted in exchange for a positive review. All opinions expressed are my own and not edited by any companies mentioned.**

reviewText:
I bought this to carry as an accessory to a corporate event, on a small budget. I was delighted to see that the item comes in very elegant packaging, the metal frame of the object is as described. It is very sturdy, and well structured. The hinges and clasps line up perfectly. The interior is nicely lined with velvet and your items will not "clang around" like a rattle.  It is not big enough to hold my cell phone (because of the curved shape) and you have to be careful when opening it so that you do not get pinched in the hinge at the bottom, which is easy to do. Those are my only "buyer beware thoughts" on this product. The clutch really has a quality look and sparkle and if cared for properly could last forever.  It also came with a few extra crystals "just in case" which is always nice, and shows a company cares about a final product. I look forward to using it at all future events I may get to attend.  My husband can carry my phone in his pocket!

This would also make a wonderful gift for prom, homecoming, or any other special occasion.
summary: Elegant, quality clutch - looks like it belongs on a red carpet

My husband bought a similar bracelet (Ion Power Bracelet 3300CC) when he was attending a conference. He paid $100.00.  From the time he put it on he could feel a difference.  He has always had headaches, like 90% of the time he wakes up with a headache.  He takes 15-20+ Motrin (type products) a week.  He has back problems, ruptured disks...  He put the bracelet on Wednesday, and has NOT had a headache since. Saturday he worked on his Jeep, grinding, cutting and lifting usually he has to take a Valium when he has done so much work.  He took a hot shower and put his bracelet back on. He said he had no real pain, his muscles were a bit tight or stiff but he felt good...  OH and NO headache!!  Oh and he has not used his Ventolin inhaler either (asthma). OH MY!!  It has only been a week day.  So I will need to provide future updates.

So I wanted to find one for myself.  I contacted the person my husband bought his from and they wanted even more money than he paid.  Found this bracelet on Amazon -HC Cool Metals great price, well made, it looks and feels exactly like his, even same color box.  I do not have any chronic pain, however from the moment I put it on I could feel a difference.  I feel like I am breathing better, deeper, like I have a great deal of energy.  I also bought them for my children, their significant others, as well as several friends who have heard about the difference it has made for my husband.

I am amazed and hope you will be too!!
summary: Skeptics -  but with the relief it has made it is worth 10x the price!!

This bag weighs a bit and is on the small side - my iPhone 5s won't fit in it, even sans case - but for a clutch this gorgeous, it's worth asking your friend or date if they'll hold your phone for the evening. (If you can sew and will be wearing a fuller skirt, open up a side seam on your dress and add a pocket, as I did, or have your tailor do it. Your phone will be discreetly concealed and this spectacular bag will be the center of attention!) The bag comes with an optional chain handle, extra rhinestones, and a very sturdy storage box. I absolutely adore this purse and plan to purchase it in more colors, or perhaps different Fawziya styles, or both!
summary: Very glamorous, high-end-looking evening bag at a great price

To start off, my measurements are about 34 1/2 inch waist, a 41 inch bust, and 38 inch hips. I figured the dress would be a little small, considering I'm about an inch-3 inches bigger in every measurement than an XL, but I ordered it anyways, figuring I needed the dress, had a gift card, and could risk it or get a return. I was expecting the worst; for it not to fit, for it to be too short, for it to be falling apart or a crappy, thin material, but my fears were put to rest as soon as my brother fully zipped it up.

This dress is exactly what I paid for but way better than I expected from a new store with no reviews. The dress is awesome! The fabric is shiny as it's peach polyester, but not in a bad way. It's lined, the seams are nice, and it /fit/ despite my size. Granted, the arms are a little tight, but my arms are pretty big around and it would fit someone with skinnier arms than me. I'm about 5'5 and it came down to my mid thighs (see pictures for details.)

I love this dress. It didn't come with the gloves, but I emailed the seller to see if they were separate or something, but it's still not a big deal.
Also, it'd be cute with a petticoat, but you don't honestly need one either. It's pleated enough and the material's thick enough it holds its shape well.

/Definitely/ worth coming back to!
summary: Exactly what I hoped for and more

reviewText:
This cosplay is totally adorable and worth the money. when I first saw the price i was sceptical, but once I received it in the mail and tried it on, it fit amazingly.
Due to the sizing, I would say go with a size up, just in case it runs small. It's better to get something to big than to small, you can always adjust it later if need be. I fit into a L, with 3 extra inches for room, but I decided to go with the XL, so I could make adjustments if it was too big.
The gloves were a bit small, and the collar a bit big, but I don't plan to wear those. If you want to make it poofy, add a petticoat underneath, but it's totally fine as it is.
Adding a few bows or bracelets, along with the headband, would be a cute idea to make the cosplay stand out more.
summary: This cosplay is totally adorable and worth the money

reviewText: (Excuse my messy room) This dress looks exactly like the one in the photo. It is so cute and I love it so much! I'm 5'10 160lbs. and I got at XXL and it fit perfectly ^.^ It is a little tight around the bust area and the gloves fit a bit tight but other than that, this kawaii maid cosplay is perfect  the shipping was fast and I would recommend (not if you're a bigger person).
Excellent costume for the price

True to measurements.  bought XL. I am L to size 12 in pants for women's petites (5'1") and a S-M in tops (34C).
Pros:
excellent quality for a low price costume. Sure there are slightly fraying bows, but the material of the dress is nice and soft.
Goes great with my Petticoat. It flounces! I'm flouncing!
Apron was a separate piece. I couldn't tell from the picture immediately so I'm very pleased.

Cons: slightly small in some parts....with some things...
Namely - arm holes.
I have fat arms. Let's just say if your "biceps" are about 13.5 in circumference relaxed, you're gonna be a tight fit. Made it difficult to get into and out of. I was worried I would tear a seam. It'd be easier if it zipped but this is a pullover.
Gloves - I tore a seam in one of the gloves trying to get it over my forearm (nothing some quick stitching won't fix if I choose to wear them at all). XL dress does not reflect size of glove...one size fits some. Now I wear a size 6.5 - 7 ring at the largest, and still had a bit of a time getting my hands in.

Chest is actually kind of big on me but I knew it would be from the measurements. Besides, that actually really helps b/c I have wide shoulders. Probably the one reason I was able to get out of it without tearing anything.

Summary. Just like everyone else says, follow the measurements. I think I'd give it 5 stars if it zipped up b/c then I won't have to pray not to mess it up getting in and out of. Ah what the heck, the world needs more prayer.
summary: Small in one part, big in the other, Overall excellent

(Basic info: female early 20s, size 11 pants, medium in shirts, 36b, 4 feet 11in tall.) I ordered this dress with prime and it really did come in 2 days right on time! It can be worn with or without a petticoat but if you are looking for a cafe or anime cosplay i suggest a petticoat for aesthetics.  I want to add that i was expecting only the dress apron and gloves but it comes with everything pictured with the exception of a petticoat, stockings, and obviously shoes. I love this dress. I will order from this seller again!

reviewText:
Firstly my measurements are 36C-28-37. 110lbs.

This fits me well. I would suggest going by your bust size, since that seems to be the most important in this case. Even if the waist is a little loose (which is was for me; an inch or two). The apron is tied separately around you and will tighten that part of the costume.
It looks just like the picture. It does flair out a bit, but I suspect she is wearing a petticoat.
The gloves are slippery and a bit see through. Also not extremely tight. If you were to actually roleplay as a maid in this I would suggest using different gloves or else you will risk dropping sheet everywhere.
This outfit does not stretch. You will not be able to do quadruple back flips in this, or reach high places, but if you have noodle arms like me, you should be comfortable.

The package comes with everything in the picture, EXCLUDING the stockings and INCLUDING a kind of mulit-purpose polka dot kerchief for your head. It's in place of the headpiece I guess which I like because the headpiece felt silly to me.

I got an 2XL since im 5'11with D cup boobs. Most dresses never pass my butt or fit over my boobs. But this one does! It ends like half of a foot below my butt. And my boobs are not getting smashed or its to loose around them. It fots so well for its price! Its a nice thin fabic so its breathable! The sleeves are sorta tight but I expected that will the fluff shoulder thing going  on! Lol the apron can come off. The gloves are tight but they will fit you if u have small fingers. Um the headband will hurt ur head a bit but thats because its plastic. So I'm very happy with my purchase! I'm going as a kitty maid for an anime convention,  and I think im going to knock it out of the park! :D
summary: Purrrrect for a Kitty Maid Cosplayer!!

reviewText: gloves too tight. but aside from that it is wonderful.

It was very high quality and lots of accessories for the cost.  Too tight in the chest area but fine in waist.  I'm a 36B but wear a size 6 clothes.  I ordered a medium.  Next time go two up from what American sizes suggest.

What you get:
A full dress, with a super long zipper in the back.
An Apron. Yes, the apron is a separate accessory that ties behind you.
A faux collar, left as an option to be tied around your neck.
A headband with cute frills and black ribbons.
A pair of gloves, that is not one-size-fits-all.

When you review the list of items you receive, you can bet that it is not your average halloween buy. The quality is exceptional, and you can feel it right in the fabric. From the fabric to the stitching, the dress is absolutely gorgeous. At 5'3, 150lbs, the outfit reaches just above my knees in a perfect fitting, and if it's loose, you can always tie the apron a little tighter to get to your fit. I only purchased this as a fun thing for my Twitch TV broadcasts. My original plans changed the moment I wore it, and I'm sold! Thanks to the length and the relative thickness of the fabric, I can actually wear this at an actual convention with no embarrassment! You don't even need an underskirt, but if you add a bit of a mini tulle skirt, you'll get a nice pouf!

Note: The only draw back is in the gloves, which are not made with a stretchy fabric. Instead, you'll find that it has a hard time fitting most arms. I have relatively small arms and fingers, and I found the XL set barely fit on my fingers and only reached half way on my forearm. However, the gloves are unnecessary. You didn't buy this cosplay for the gloves, and if you did, I'd question your buyer sensibilities. If you still want gloves, I think a proper fitting test in a bridal or costume store for a pair of white gloves will be the better option.
It fits perfectly and is super comfortable! It works well for cosplay and looks really cute!

I was really happy with this necklace! Docked a star because there was no tracking number, so i had full on anxiety for a month until this arrived. Google says to count 21 days from the ship date of your item if it's coming from China; that put my package arrival at 2/11 and I received it around 2/7. Once it finally arrived, it was better than expected! I was nervous about the reviews that spoke of a short chain and blobby charm picture, but my necklace looks exactly like the picture and the chain measures 14" clasped. I got this necklace because it looks like my cat, and overall I'm super happy with it. I even like the antiquey brass finish. Definitely well made for $1.93.

***UPDATE: Not two hours after I wrote this review, I tugged it lightly and the chain broke, two links came apart. I put it back together and chalked it up to ordering from China. Three hours after that, I was bending down to grab something and didn't touch the chain-if suddenly came apart again. This is going to be annoying. Docked another star. That's what you get for a $2 necklace I suppose.

reviewText:
It toooooooook forever to arrive, but it did come from China, so I can't complain. The pendent is very nice, the kitty is freaking adorbs, and it's constructed well.
The chain it came with, though? It's like 10.5 inches long. It would choke a toddler. It's the strangest length I have ever seen. I have no idea who would wear this chain.  It's extra weird, because the pendant is sort of big (not huge, but way too big for a kid's necklace, in case I just misunderstood the whole affair and this was meant for a child). Or was it meant for a cat? A meta necklace for a cat? Should I try that?
So, subtracting a star because now I have to find something to hang it on, and though that's a first world problem, it's a pain. It's brass, so I have to find a match, and...whine. Or, I will just get lazy and give it to my cat. He's been eyeballing it anyway.
In sum: cute. Be prepared with your own chain.

Has been loved and worn every day - a last-minute gift that was one of the best decisions that I made.

The pendant was on a chain AND arrived with a black ribbon necklace alternate. The pendant is true to color (maybe slightly richer colours than in the image), and the circle is about the size of a US quarter.

Looks amazing on.

UPDATE: Februray
I will add that while I'm still a 5-star fan of this pendant, it must be mentioned that the chain is not the strongest (it IS a $10 necklace): just remember that and don't be unrealistic. To be fair, ours broke because it got tangled in very long, fine hair (after lots of running around), and the attempts to untangle the hair and chain (without a scissors) resulted in breaking the chain. I suppose, in retrospect, I have to say that the blame is not entirely on the chain. It did take a fair bit of elbow-grease to actually pull it apart. (And I used that as a perfect excuse to buy a different cat-pendant from the same seller to get another chain).
Love love love it! I received a black ribbon to wear it on as well, which looks great.

reviewText:
WOW
I cannot properly express how much I love this outfit!! It came all nicely packaged with the original tag.
Provided you order according to the size chart they provide and not Amazon's size chart, it fits exactly as advertised. I got an XL and the only thing I'll say is that with my widest point being ~41" I was ALMOST unable to pull it up over my hips/ass when unzipped as far down as it will go. This really wouldn't have been too big of an issue anyhow, seeing as I could have always put it on over my head rather than pulling it down but that's always more of a hassle for me.
I also included a couple pictures of the dress by itself without the apron, since the dress is pretty cute by itself too!
I hadn't realized the bow in front was just pin-on which is WONDERFUL in my opinion. So, if you don't want it there, you could pin it to the front of the apron or not have it entirely. I personally chose to pin it at the base of the tail that I wore with this outfit.
The only piece of the outfit I would say looks cheap/tacky is the ears on the headband, which for me wasn't a problem at all seeing as I had my own pair of ears and tail that I wanted to wear with it, so I wasn't going to use the headband anyhow!
Fits very comfortably, INCREDIBLE value for what you're getting, in my opinion. I would think this was still a steal even at $50 or $60. And it's super, super cute!!

reviewText: Great quality, timely arrival, Great savings!
Excellent

I ordered this product to repair the clasp on my watchband. I used a SE - Spring Bar Tool Set - 5in., 7 Pc previously ordered to make the change. The large assortment meant I could be sure of having the correct size, and a generous supply of each meant I don't have to worry about replacements for some time to come. I have no complaints as to quality or fit and finish. If I had to nit-pick, I would complain about the case; I wish it would hinge instead of being a friction fit, secured by cellophane tape at the joint by the factory. Place this in your desk drawer along with a spring bar and you'll have the ability to fix watch bands for years to come
summary: Excellent for separated watch bands- no measurement needed!

reviewText: Fast ship and works as advertised
excellent product.. i highly recommend
this is a handy collection of watchband springs. I put one in a watch for myself and it seems pretty sturdy..
Good pins and wide variety. good service too.
I love being able to replace my own pins in  my watch. This is so much better than paying $10 for each broken pin at the shop.

Received Spring Bar Set on time and in excellent condition.  I had just ordered a new spring bar tool but knew that when changing watch bands it is not uncommon to fire a installed spring bar across the room, never to be seen again.  Also, many of the new less expensive watch bands do not come with replacement spring bars.  With this in mind, I ordered this spring bar set.  The set itself has just about every size of spring bar you could possibly need, and many you won't.  However, at the price, it sets the average customer up in spring bars for years to come and is much cheaper than taking your watch to your local jeweler for band replacement.  The spring bars themselves seem to be well made and were easy to install with my new spring bar tool.  One of these replacement spring bars has been  on my watch for about a month with no problems.  I have large wrists, and even with long watch bands, exert pressure on the spring bars. So far, so good
summary: Nice set at a good price.

reviewText: Good, basic set of pins. Just be careful how you open it or you'll spend quite a while re-organizing them all.

Not the most robust springbars you'll come across, but useful.  The barrel diameter is small at 1.4mm and there's usually a little slop in the end pins, but if you're looking for a replacement bar for a lightweight watch these will do the trick.  I don't think I'd trust them for something heavy and/or valuable though.  Most of my watches have lugs measuring between 18-22mm, so in my case a bunch of these bars will never be used but that's not a negative.  Other users may find the variety very useful.  As others have mentioned, the box could be much more user friendly.  The lid is just a friction fit and comes off easily. Use a rubber band or some tape to secure it or else at some point you'll be picking up a bunch of spilled bars.  Don't ask me how I know...
Good product.

Alot of people complain about the size which is true you have to order way up but when you order from China you have to remember that they are sized for Chinese not Americans! Also a lot of people complain about the quality which is true it isn't high end but for under $10 you shouldn't expect a $50 dress quality; it's about the right quality for under $10! As long as you are aware of these things and keep that in mind when you decide if you want it or not you should be fine! Some people also complained about the color! My dress was the same color as the picture! reviewText: Absolutely hysterical to see a Unicorn walking by. My daughter loved it. Just a few things to keep in mind..the smell is horrific out of the package. You really need to purchase early and air it out for a few weeks. I can't imagine putting this thing on my head right out of the package. It smelled up my entire garage the first night. Visibility is just so-so. You have to use the nostrils and mouth holes to see. Other than that, its pretty funny. My daughter wore it in a Halloween parade and the little kids loved it.

I ordered this from KingMas on september 25th, 2014 and the expected delivery date was October 21st- November 6th and it arrived today, October 6th. I was very pleased that I was able to see exactly where my order was at all times, every few days I was updated about its location and my anticipation grew daily. I have to say I was very excited to see the mail man today knowing he had my package with him. I immediately took it into the house and commenced to delicately open the small bag it came in. to say the least; i was not at all disappointed. I was very cautious about who to buy this from becuase I had heard a lot of bad reviews on amazon from other sellers (I have been researching this product for well over a month) and I have to say that this one was worth the price I paid for it. here are the things I noticed right off the bat: there isn't much neck to this mask, but considering its size, it covers my entire neck and I'm a young woman. it does NOT have an opening in the back like other masks I have seen on Amazon, but it was still extremely easy to put on and it did not pull my hair which was still up in a loose bun. the picture on here is different than the actual mask itself in that the one i recieved is all pink around the mouth area and has no black at all on it. it also has pink shading around the face to give it a muscle effect. the eyes are very bright blue and seem to be of a good quality of paint. the mane is soft and wild looking but not in a matted cheap kind of way. when i put it on there was only a slight latex odor but nothing overwhelming or sickening. the hooves gloves are a nice touch but i have to admit that i was slightly disappointed when i tried them on. they are entirely too big for my arms and slide off easily unless i wear a long sleeve jacket (fortunately i had planned to wear this mask and hooves set with my long sleeve leather jacket so they at least stay on). they don't look anything like the picture though and thats why i feel this product only deserved 4.5 stars (but it only let me rate in whole numbers). the hooves do not have the same level of detail that is shown in the picture but they still add a fun and exciting touch to the outfit. i looked at other masks in local halloween stores and they were not nearly as nicely made as this one. all in all i would recommend this as a great gift for anyone who loves unicorns. i cant wait to start wearing it out and showing it off.

I have broad shoulders, and even at this weight, I have a smaller waist, curvy hips and a nice size rear-end. (I have the classic hour glass figure)
I bought the 4XL and it fits me perfectly. Even with my broad shoulders, there's plenty of fabric and I can move around very comfortably. I can raise my arms up, wrap my arms around a big man, and completely cross my arms around myself (think of giving yourself a huge hug) without it pulling tight across the shoulders in the front or back, And, the sleeves don't get tight or pull up either.
I have pretty big boobs right now because of my weight, but it wasn't too tight in the chest at. If someone is a true 38DD, this will fit very well. I think if I went up a cup size it would still fit, but it would be pretty snug.
I have plenty of room in the waist.
Like I said, I have a classic hourglass figure, I have a smaller waist, rounder hips and a generous derriere. It wasn't too tight across the hips or buns.
It still shows a beautiful silhouette but it's not too tight at all. None of my rolls can be seen, but you can tell I have a figure.
I could still wear this if I gained another 5-10lbs, but if I lost 10-15lbs, I think this would be too big to wear anymore.
Also, the length of this top is proportional to what the thin model is wearing. The sides have slits, too.
As far as the fabric is concerned, it's very good material (for the life of me I can't think of what it's called, I'm sorry) it's very well made and the embellishments that are on the middle of your chest and goes around the collar, are very nice material as well, and extremely well made.
I bought the blue-green tunic, and I have to wear a tank top under it. Because of the way the collar is cut, you can't tell I have a tank top on. You'll have to make sure you wear a tank that's a little lower cut at the top so that it doesn't show.
I think the pink tunic, however, is a little more see through than the blue one. (I haven't got that one yet and will update when I get it.)
All the seams were even, there were no loose threads, and the buttons and embellishments are sewn in very well. There's absolutely no danger that my top is going to fall apart.

I hope this helps clear up some of the confusion on this particular top. Please feel free to respond if you have any questions about it. Ill be more than happy to help if I can.
summary: This tunic is stunning! I get endless complements when I wear this!

This item is NOT what is pictured. I should have known better seeing how blurry the picture is, but given the affordable price, I took a chance. Good grief this is terrible! The picture appears to be an opal with an elegant, curved, crown-like inlay (i.e. flush against the opal) and 3 dangling stones.

Actual product is a flat pendant with a "false opal" hot glued to the back (off-center). Dangling stones are a mismatched color, off-center, and do not fit with the main "opal"'s appearance. Furthermore, they don't actually dangle but kind of hang awkwardly in space (ring is too tight to allow for actual free movement) Chain was broken prior to arrival and due to pendant design cannot be easily replaced.

Normally I love opals, and I was hoping to get a necklace that goes well with sweaters, but the quality on this is so abysmal that it is going straight in the trash; it's not worth paying the shipping fees to get this item returned. I hope you enjoyed my money Buyinhouse, because that's the last penny you'll ever get from me.
I received it earlier then I expected.  Small and delicate but worth it, the picture defiantly doesn't do it any justice.

Unfortunately, this picture not only doesn't do this piece justice, but it also doesn't show it very well at all. I figured at $2 it was worthwhile to satisfy my curiosity about what this necklace really looked like. This was actually the first piece I purchased on Buyinhouse jewelry, and I am glad I did.
The workmanship is much, much better than the price would suggest. The pendant is 2 1/2 cm wide and 2 cm long, not counting the dangles. The center dangle is 1 1/2 cm long. There is the central stone and three small ones which dangle and measure 7 mm. There is beautiful filigree across the bottom of the central stone and rhinestone detailing all along the sides and bottom of the setting, and a single rhinestone adorns the central dangle. The pale pink stones appear to be a synthetic opal or cats eye and do have a nice shimmer. The chain is delicate appearing but is sturdy enough to wear and is 18" long with a 2" extension and a lobster-claw clasp. This is a nice, small, elegant necklace suitable for everyday wear or when a big ostentatious piece of jewelry isn't appropriate. Highly recommend!

I bought another Fawziya clutch that is exactly the same as this one, but the clasp is a cluster of flowers instead of a peacock, and on that bag the clasp is very loose and will probably fall off soon.  This one doesn't seem to have the same issue.  On both bags, the chain straps are extremely flimsy and seem like they'll break inevitably, so I don't plan on using them.  They're not very aesthetically pleasing, anyway, so even if they were more solid I doubt I would use them.  My only issue is that it's difficult to tell when looking at the bag from more than two feet away that the clasp is actually a peacock.  It reads like just a blob of crystals.  Up close, this is lovely, but from further away the peacock is completely lost.  As for the size, this is a small bag that I can hold in one hand (I have pretty small hands), but it has decent depth.  I'll easily fit my iphone 5 and a lipstick and a couple of other small items in this bag.

reviewText:
I have been looking for a wallet like this for years! The RFID blocking is an added bonus, but the real gold stars go for how perfectly designed this is for holding everything:
The phone pocket has a magnetic strap to keep the phone from falling out, but I can whip it out to answer a call quickly.
The wallet zips closed to keep my credit cards and money from slipping out, and has a full-sized bill pocket so that I don't have to fold the bills in half to fit inside.
There is a clear window section to slide your license into, with a cut-out area that enables you to slip your license in and out of the pocket easily if needed.
There's also a zippered pocket for change.
The strap makes it easy to carry the wallet without using my hands if necessary, and I can even slip the strap up my arm over my shoulder to carry the wallet closely at my side if I need. The strap has a hook so that I can detach it, run the strap through my key ring, and carry my keys securely with the wallet if I want.
The black quilted leather pattern is beautifully sewn.
All in, this is absolutely the perfect wallet- I've been looking for one like this for years!
summary: The perfect grab and go wallet!

reviewText:
I love this suit.  The boy-shorts underneath cover everything, and the top has padded cups for modesty, and stays put when I bend over.  It's a nice compromise as a more modest swim suit that looks "normal."
With that said, I think it would only fit a very specific body shape.  I ordered an XL and I am 5'7", and about 120 lbs with a very small bust.  I have a slight pear shape, and it is a bit small in the hips (which I notice when I pull it on and off.  I am actually ordering a 2x because of this.)  I think anyone with curves would have trouble fitting this suit.  If you're like me (no curves, sigh) it is a lovely suit, my new favorite.

UPDATE:  The 2XL was much too big, so I guess I'll stick with my XL though it is a bit snug in the hips.  Still love this suit.
summary: Awesome suit for a specific body shape

The zipper does not cover the whole mouth of the bag: instead, it looks as if its not meant to keep the bag closed so much as to keep the bag from gaping wide open when being carried/set down (the shape of the bag makes it 'spread', especially when it's full). This does not bother me (I have plenty of open-topped bags) but what does is the zipper's inability to stay closed. Every time I zip it up, it unzips itself pretty quickly afterwards! As for the bag strap, like many other reviewers to my disappointment I found the clasps to be very weak. My second day out with the bag, I was walking down the street and the bag dropped to the ground, since the metal lobster clasp had snapped. I might have taken a star for that if bundle monster had not been incredibly helpful in sending me a brand new strap. I still bought another just in case this one breaks, too: for anyone interested in a sturdier, slightly more stylish strap that matches this bag perfectly, I suggest Adjustable Genuine Slick Brown Leather Shoulder Strap for Any Bag (Silver). It's also great if you, like me, love this bag enough that you'd rather pay for a better strap than return the bag :)

I really do love this bag. The bohemian style is perfect for life in Southern California.  I prefer a larger bag and the hobo slouchy style. I don't carry a lot but if I need to I can. I've been throwing my yoga/running cloths in here too instead of taking a separate bag. This thing can hold everything imaginable. Along with my phone, keys, kindle, infinity scarf and makeup bag I was still able to throw in a extra set of cloths for the next day when I planned to stay the night at a friends house after work last week. Totally worth twenty dollars. Has a cross body strap also.  I bought the Dark Tan one (since it was the cheapest) to test it out, and its ended up being a lovely color. Perfect if I need to take it to the beach too. Now I'm going to buy the charcoal one as a travel weekender bag. I go to the desert most weekends for weekend get a ways and this bag is ideal for that. Its not very heavy so not sure how well made it is but good enough to spend twenty dollars on. There is a middle zipper section which I find slightly annoying. Just one big open pouch is perfect for me and easier to find things, so I may try to simple cut it out. Otherwise a very, very cute, hobo style bag with casual  European looking too.

Update (03/10/17) So about three days ago the shoulder strap broke on both ends. I tried emailing the seller but I never heard back from the seller. If the shoulder strap is not an issue for you then its fine but I rely on it on a daily basis since I ride my bike around locally on a daily basis. I guess you get what you pay for one way or another,  poor customer service. Still like my bag but it would be nice to buy from a more professional  seller. Just a heads up if you run into any issues within the first thirty day.

Update (03/18/17) While out shopping over the weekend, one of the shoulder straps just randomly broke. I was so embarrassed, I had my hands full with groceries then this happens while I'm waiting in this super long line. I'd much rather pay more and have something that is a lot more reliable than this bag. I really liked the idea of it but honestly its just not made well enough to use on a daily basis. I could have my husband fix it but that's not the point. I'm going to have to send this one back.
summary: A perfect European hobo bag for the bohemian in you.

Really a cool bag.

I'll start by saying I have given this bag 4 stars based on the price point of $20 (great price for a cute bag!), however, if it cost more, I would definitely downgrade to 2 or 3 stars since this probably will not be a long lasting item (see comments below.) So please keep the price of this bag in mind when you read my perceived "cons".

There were some comments about color on this bag, however, my monitor colors matched well to the item, so the color was as I expected.  It is a dark denim with a washed look to it, darker brown arm straps.  When I first saw the picture, I was attracted to it because it looked like suede to me. However, as I read the title and the reviews, I realized it was denim (more casual that what I was originally looking for), but since I liked the look of the bag, I thought the denim could be nice in the spring/summer.

I just received it, so I can't speak to how well it will hold up, but the interior looks cheap (thin liner material that may tear easily at the seams  if you put anything too heavy in it it, zippers are not very good and the pockets do not look too functional.) However, the exterior looks like it will be ok (there wasn't any sloppy stitching and it was symmetrical -- which would be my main concern at this price.)  The only drawback for me -- and this is completely personal preference -- is that I would have liked it to be a bit smaller.  I was looking for a larger purse, but this is better described as a smaller bag than large purse.  Hard to list dimensions since it is larger around the center than the top and bottom, so I wasn't sure of the sizing when ordering.  So be aware of the sizing when you order, depending on what you want it for it could be perfect size or it could be too large.  I would be great as a beach tote, a small carry-on, yoga/exercise bag, etc.

A final "con" is that the zipper does not go from edge to edge on the bag, meaning you don't want to keep your wallet or keys loosely placed within the bag, as it would be easy for someone to put their hand in and grab it since only there is a large open gap at each end of the zipper.  There is a large zipped area inside the bag, but if you don't like going through two zippers to get to your wallet, you may not like this bag.

Again, I listed quite a few cons, but for $20 I think it was a great deal.  Since styles change so quickly, I am happy to pay less for a bag that may not last for a second season, than pay a lot for one that may be out of style by next year.  Again, personal preferences will decide whether the pros outweigh the cons for you.
summary: Great bag for the price even though quality is not great.

I am one of those people who needs a Sherpa to carry all my junk. This bag is perfect.

Before buying this bag I read hundreds of reviews trying to figure out if this was the exact same bag that sold in a range from $21 (inc. shipping) to $57. Measurements varied on listings but that is understandable due to the way the bag is made. The only other question was that some ads said the handle was genuine leather and some said vegan leather. While I'd be happy to have "vegan leather" I adamantly did not want a cheap looking leather imitation.

The "leather" is of good enough quality to easily fool most people and please the rest. The fabric is excellent quality and the stitching is perfectly done. Hardware is surprisingly good quality. This feels more like a military surplus bag than a cheap import.

The one exterior pocket is a little more shallow than I would have made it but it is fine for holding my phone and keys and that's what I keep there. Numerous reviews mention the main zippered pocket in the center of the bag as being awkward and in the way. I could see the reason they thought this when I looked into the bag but in use that is not the case at all. The center compartment can easily hold an 8 inch tablet with charger, wires and earbuds which will in turn hold that pocket up. Alternately, a "pure organizer" (which I use a number of - and which sell very inexpensively on amazon) will fit in that pocket giving that one space as much organized carry space as most full bags. Another organizer can fit on either side of that zipper. I am using one and the other side is for my wallet, eyeglasses case and other largish items. (In my attached picture you can see that I have one - green - organizer in the large middle pocket and a pink organizer to one side of it.)

Downside: Nothing is perfect. The pockets on the inside walls of the bag are not very good. The zippered one on mine has a bad zipper. It seems fine but it's open no matter which way you zip it. It will still hold some items away from others but it would be nice if it zipped. I'm happier to have the crucial zippers (outside pocket, center pocket and bag closer - be the perfect ones) The pockets on the other outer wall are really too shallow for much at 3 3/4 inches deep (and not very wide).

The oddly designed top zipper is not bad. Part of it's odd design is to allow you to stuff bigger items into the bag. (I would rather have magnet closures and I am going to install them.) Even unzipped the bag is not in danger of losing items.  I would not consider making this bag if you offered me $21 for my time and in doubt I could buy all of its components for that price.

I don't switch pocketbooks to match my outfit. I use one bag all the time and I trade out the contents or the organizers I put in it. This is going to be one of my favorite bags, ever.

reviewText: I love this bag. .

Please see original review below. This one I'm writing nearly 2 years later. For a $22 bag, it's pretty amazing. I've been looking to replace this bag for something more "elegant", but just can't find anything else that works as well. I am an over-packer. I take everything with me. Everything. I can fit my MacBook Air (13') in its case, along with a 33oz Camelbak Eddy, 26oz smoothie tumbler, and all my "daily" stuff (European wallet, 2 eyeglass cases, two "makeup" bags, checkbook, snack pack--I have a case for everything and everything in its case). On occasion, there are also books and/or files, then loose stuff (miscellaneous lady things -- mirror, lip balm, business cards, gum, mints, hand wipes, hand lotion, brush, clips and ties) which fits in the interior compartments, plus three sets of keys, two cell phones, and a partridge in a pear tree -- and a second "after hours" purse when needed. The bag has held all of that weight amazingly, even lugging it through the airport, hanging it from door hooks, carrying it by the arm straps and cross-body style. It is not perfect (see below), but it is a damn fine, rugged, lasting bag that has not been treated daintily. I wasn't thrilled at first, but I am very happy with this purchase in the long run.

Original Review: First, this is a bargain for a $22 bag. No doubt about that. However, my eyes are still watering from the odor it is emitting. The interior slots are too shallow for a phone or pens. Even the interior zippered pocket is tiny by any purse's standards. The middle pocket holds more, thankfully. The exterior zippered pocket is rather large -- just wish that was on the inside. The fact that the bottom is firm doesn't help when you have the bag over your shoulder either by the bag's handles or the larger strap. I would happily pay more for deeper slots and magnetic snap closures, which I think I will look into adding. The zipper closure is more of a gesture than anything else. It takes more effort to zip than snap and, from what I've seen so far, the zipper opens pretty easily on its own because it doesn't go from end to end. Snaps would have been a better design feature, or a hook latch, even it if upped the price.

Again, this is a great $22 bag. You really can't go wrong with it. And it was received very quickly on free/standard shipping, which is always appreciated. But it does fall short on the standards (pocket/slot depth, closures) that other large bags have, even at a lesser price. And, oh, that smell.

reviewText: Great bag! Fits lots of stuff. Very comfortable to carry and seems pretty sturdy. I am using it for my work stuff and am very pleased. I often carry my computer, binders and folders with me, and the bag fits it all as well as all the tech accessories: there are plenty of pockets and slots for everything.
Love the bag. Yes it does have an odd smell, air it out. Also some have said the zipper arrived broken, no it's not. It arrived in the middle, zip, then unzip and it's just fine.

Very cool!  I love this bag - it's comfortable, the straps are padded, the bottom is flat so that it sits nicely without falling all over itself.  It's got a very classy look while being casual and fun at the same time. It has a very roomy interior with a zippered divider that is a nice place to carry my laptop. Great purchase - solid denim fabric, very well made.

I've had this bag for a week now and love it. The red is not too red. More of a washed out red. I used the handles the first few days but since I usually carry cross body bags I removed the handles (they unbuckle ). I've been carrying with the shoulder strap now. It's very roomy. Love it.

Great bag!  Love the size and the shape, the fabrics and trims.  It's easy to carry over the shoulder with the "handles" (haven't tried out the cross-body strap yet), and plenty big enough for all my stuff.  The bag has just enough softness and  *slouch* to it to make it comfy against my body as I'm carrying it.

One thing to note about this bag is the main zipper.  It is a sort of "floating" zipper at the ends, as my photo shows.  It works fine, but I confess that I'd rather the zipper went from end to end as one would expect--and that is the only reason my rating is 4 stars instead of 5.  Fabulous bag and I may just have to get more in some of the other colors!
summary: Great bag! Love the size and the shape

I absolutely love these! They look and feel nice, and they are SO comfortable. And they fit perfectly. They are made of nylon and spandex, so they have more of that rubbery (bathing suit type) feel to them instead of cotton, but I like them like that, makes them more comfortable to me. And there are definitely no panty lines with these! They look to be decently well made, and my only drawback is that the seams looks like they may wear out easily. The way they are sewed looks just a little sloppy, just a little. You can't tell until you look at them up close. So we will see how they hold up. But over all, this is a great deal, and I will probably buy more of these.

Fabric is nice and comfortable, yet not flimsy or see through. The navy blue color is classic and very pretty.  It fits very snug however, so if you want an ultra smooth silhouette without any indentations from the tight panties, suggest ordering one size up from your usual. Love the laser cut edges, which are folded under and bonded instead of sewed. In my experience, this means do not tumble dry or use warm wash even if the care instructions permit this. The bond will last much longer if cold washed and line dried.

It is not completely seamless as there are side seams, but they are unobtrusive and won't be noticeable unless you are wearing something truly skin tight with ultra lightweight fabric. And if you are, you might as well just go pantyless.. ;) This is a more elegant option for all other situations.
summary: Fantastic, but fits a tad snug

I'm very pleased overall.  My hips are 36" and a small is just a bit snug.  They ride low enough to work well with low rise jeans.  Very comfortable.  No irritating tag.  The feel of the fabric seemed a bit odd until I wore them and realized I barely knew I was wearing them!  These are hand wash only but so affordable I can buy enough to do hand wash once per month.
Update: The snug fit conforms to the body perfectly within a couple of wears.  The hand wash that I was so dreading is a non issue.  I wash them in the washing machine on cold and hang dry.  So far they are holding up great.
I highly recommend this item both for comfort and price!

I bought this petticoat to go under a vintage modest dress I bought for 50th day of School.  It was too long so I had to hike up the waist band to my bra (I'm 5'8).  Now this next part is partly my own fault but I thought I'd share it anyways since someone else might be thinking of doing the same thing.  Once the petticoat was pulled up to my bra, my dress flared out nicely and looked very classy.  The problem was that the tulle rubbed on my hips from walking and basic movement to the point of it being VERY painful by the end of the day.  I had red marks on my hips that night and thought they would go away however when I got up in the morning, the red marks had turned into large scabs that were extremely raw and painful! Ewww! They are still there and it's been weeks.  I think this might happen if you sit down frequently in this skirt but on your legs/bum if you wear it correctly on the waist.  I will not wear this again next year.

This is my review on the Hip Mall Necklace. Disclosure: I was offered this product at a reduced price in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion. When I do a review I always get one or more people to put their opinion in on it, because people have different likes and dislikes and I feel the more perspectives I get on something the better I can review it. I instantly fell in love with this necklace the moment I saw it, but with such a low price tag I expected it to be sub par in quality. I was wrong however, after stress testing it all the way from its chain that latches it together, to the tassels, and the lace. I was very impressed how it held up, not only did it hold up, the lace didn't lose it's shape through my tests. Even though I loved the necklace, I sadly lacked the look and lifestyle to make proper use of it. So to better display it I grabbed one of my good friends who is in a band and asked her to model it. Gabbys assessment of the necklace was very positive, she fell in love with it just as I did. It was a perfect fit, it was too stiff and didn't feel scratchy against the skin. I even asked her to give the tassels a tug and give her opinion on the durability of the necklace. She felt it was durable as well as comfortable, and was something she would gladly wear it at one of her shows. I will most likely be buying more of this jewelry, it has style and comes at a great price!
summary: A great necklace for dressy occasions
